text: 🚨2023-2024 U.S. Flu Season: Preliminary In-Season Burden Estimates🚨💡Did you know that the CDC provides weekly updates on flu-related hospitalizations during flu season? 🤔📈According to their latest report, the preliminary in-season burden estimates are now available! 📊🔍But wait, there's more! These estimates are compared to end-of-season hospitalization estimates from previous flu seasons. 🤔💥The in-season estimates are preliminary and change weekly as new flu hospitalizations are reported to the CDC. 📊👀Want to know the best part? The estimates on this page are cumulative and will increase as the season progresses! 🚀💪So, stay informed and keep an eye on those numbers!
